title: About
text:
This site is still under development.
Powered by Hal9

title: CLAUDE.md
text:
This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.


Local Development:
quarto preview          # Start local dev server on port 4710
Build:
quarto render          # Generate static site to docs/ directory
No testing setup - The project uses a placeholder test script that exits with error.



This is a Quarto-based static website with Netlify serverless functions for a book writing service called Proofbound. The site integrates Stripe payments with HAL9 AI book generation.



Frontend: Quarto static site generator with custom CSS animations
Backend: Netlify Functions (Node.js serverless)
Payment: Stripe Checkout integration
AI Service: HAL9 book generation API
Hosting: Netlify with custom domain proofbound.com





Landing page (index.qmd) → Stripe Checkout → Success page verification → HAL9 book generator
Payment verification prevents unauthorized access to premium AI tool
Serverless functions handle payment validation and HAL9 URL generation





Content Files: - index.qmd - Landing page with animated book-writing theme - success.qmd - Post-payment success page (only displays after payment verification) - about.qmd, cancel.qmd - Supporting pages
Configuration: - _quarto.yml - Site config (theme: minty, fonts: Crimson Text, port: 4710) - netlify.toml - Deployment config, redirect rules for payment verification - _resources/js/config.js - Stripe configuration with live keys
Serverless Functions: - netlify/functions/verify-session.js - Validates Stripe payment before allowing success page access - netlify/functions/hal9-embed.js - Generates HAL9 iframe URL with API key
Environment Variables Required: - STRIPE_SECRET_KEY - Stripe API secret key - HAL9_API_KEY - HAL9 service API key



Stripe Setup: - Uses live price ID: price_1RUa4cFVqC8fbxB6WWtakog4 - External Stripe endpoint: https://proofbound-stripe.netlify.app - Session verification enforced via Netlify redirect rules
Security Flow: - /success.html redirects to /.netlify/functions/verify-session (status 302) - Function validates payment completion before serving success page - HAL9 URL generation includes CORS protection for proofbound.com




Output Directory: docs/ (configured in _quarto.yml)
Functions Directory: netlify/functions/
Domain: Custom domain setup on Netlify
No CI/CD configuration files present - likely using Netlify’s Git-based deployment





Quarto preview runs on port 4710 (not default 3000)
Site uses custom fonts (Crimson Text, Source Code Pro) with CSS loading order
No package manager scripts beyond placeholder test
Uses dotenv for environment variable management in functions
